text: This is the best day of my life
I love spending time with my family
I miss my old friends so much
Nothing seems to go right anymore
I am extremely angry right now
Why does this always happen to me
I am scared of the dark
I feel nervous about the exam
I am worried about my future
The thought of failing terrifies me
Wow I did not expect that
I am shocked by the news
I will watch a movie later
